title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 25.8 - Exempt class
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 25.8 - Exempt class

State Regulations

The exempt class shall consist of all
offices or positions, other than unskilled labor positions, for the filling of
which competitive or noncompetitive examinations may be found by the Chief

Administrator of the Courts not to be practicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
25.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
